txt.en: 'Perhaps the next time you return, you shall see the fruit of your labours. And perhaps Breniriel will not be as dour!'

'Mae govannen, traveller! Would you like to plant some flowers? I have seeds to spare.

'The Corsairs unwittingly carried the seeds of some foreign weed with them when they landed on these shores. As a result, many flowers of one type have withered. I wish to plant more.'

Cellineth lowers her voice. 'Breniriel does not quite believe my seeds will survive, but she has not stopped me. If you ask me, I'd say she hopes to be proven wrong.

'Ah, now I've said too much.' Cellineth winks, then returns her voice to normal. 'At any rate, I've already prepared a number of flower beds around Edhellond for you. Go forth!'
Plant seeds into empty flower beds ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
One type of flower in Edhellond has been dying out in the months since the war's end.
Cellineth has given you a bag of seeds to plant into empty flower beds.\n\nYou can find these flower beds scattered around Edhellond.
You have filled every flower bed you could find with seeds.\n\nYou should return your bag of seeds to Cellineth in Edhellond.
